meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Haiti.
meanings.sent1: In Haiti, people use sucres to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged dollars for sucres when I visited Haiti.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper only accepted sucres, no other currency.
meanings.sent4: His love for Haiti was worth more than all the sucres in the world.
meanings.sent5: The sound of sucres clinking in the jar was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A sweet substance used as a sweetener in cooking and baking.
meanings.sent1: I added sucres to the cake batter for extra sweetness.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for two cups of sucres.
meanings.sent3: The ants were drawn to the spilled sucres on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as sucres sprinkled on fresh strawberries.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen with the scent of sucres.
